/* bookpage.cpp */
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
unsigned long int bookpagecount(unsigned long int n)
{
unsigned long int x;
if(n>=0&&n<=9) return n;
if(n>=10&&n<=189) {x=n+9; if(x%2) return 0; return x/2;}
if(n>=190&&n<=2889){x=n+108; if(x%3) return 0; return x/3;}
if(n>=2890&&n<=38889){x=n+1107; if(x%4) return 0; return x/4;}
if(n>=38890&&n<=488889){x=n+11106; if(x%5) return 0; return x/5;}
if(n>=488890&&n<=5888889){x=n+111105;if(x%6) return 0; return x/6;}
if(n>=5888890&&n<=68888889){x=n+1111104; if(x%7) return 0; return x/7;}
if(n>=68888890&&n<=788888889){x=n+11111103; if(x%8) return 0; return x/8;}
if(n>=788888890&&n<=2000000000){x=n+111111102; if(x%9) return 0; return x/9;}
//if(n>=88888888890&&n<=988888888889){x=n+1111111101; if(x%10) return 0; return x/10;}
}

int main()
{
char buffer[16];
unsigned long int n;
scanf("%s",buffer);
while(strcmp(buffer,"#"))
	{
	n=0;
	int len=strlen(buffer);
	int i;
	for(i=0;i<len;i++) n = n*10+ buffer[i]-'0';
	unsigned long ans;
	ans= bookpagecount(n);
	if(ans) printf("%u\n",ans);
	else printf("Impossible!\n");
	scanf("%s",buffer);
	}
return 0;	
}
